Title: Stand at the counter with full conviction, think entirely, completely and thoroughly of serving the people
Designer: Shanghai Seventh Department Store Revolutionary Committee (上海市第七百貨商店革委会)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Scene in the Shanghai Seventh Department Store, we assume. The woman repairs sandals. The sign on her counter reads 小修小补 立等可取 - Small repairs, finished while you wait. The banner in the background: 全心全意为人民服务 - Serve the people wholeheartedly.
